Activity: Log in to the EHR system, review patient records for the week. Identify any missing or incomplete data.
Finalize data entry for the week, ensure all patient symptoms and vaccination statuses are accurately recorded.
Take a break, browse healthcare forums for any new insights on influenza trends.
Resume data entry, cross-check with @da-1 and @da-2 for any discrepancies.
Participate in a wrap-up meeting with @clinlead-1, @itpm-1, and @pchmp-1 to review the week's progress and discuss any outstanding issues.
Update any remaining patient records, ensure all data is complete and accurate.
Submit weekly report on data entry and training progress to @itpm-1 and @clinlead-1.
